settings.heading: A private yoga lesson designed around your needs and abilities is the best way!

settings.text: You will work out together with your instructors according to a program designed JUST FOR YOU.

settings.title: [1] You need someone who listens to you
settings.text: Individuals with tight muscles may feel pain or discomfort in specific yoga poses. This requires more work to deepen and achieve their dream yoga pose. Our teachers are fully equipped to gently guide you through your practice at a comfortable pace tailored to you.

settings.title: [2] You need to take your own path to reach your goal
settings.text: Our instructor will help you to plan your practice and leads you to your goals.

settings.title: [3] Personal feedbacks will work for you
settings.text: Our instructor will give you feedbacks for your own situations.

settings.title: [4] Safety is the most priority
settings.text: Safety practice is the fastest way to improve your practice.

settings.title: [5] Proven reputation to secure your pracitice
settings.text: You need a ceitain partner with proven record. We have been working for yoga industries 18 years and have built reputation in Asia.

settings.title: [6] 1 on 1 but affordable price
settings.text:
We recruit good quality yoga
instructors from countries with relatively low currency rate so that you can make 1 on 1 practice with daily routine.

settings.title: 6 reasons why 1 on 1 practice is good for people with Tight Muscles?
Felice
settings.text: "Yoga is not about how strong or flexible you are but it’s for those who are willing. All yogis were once a beginner, so it’s okie to practice based on your body condition and follow your own pace as long as you feel good about yourself and breath comfortably." by Felice

settings.title: July Lai
settings.text: "Muscle stiffness is when your muscles feel tight and you find it more difficult to move than you usually do. Reasons: either muscles are overuse, or being physically inactive for long periods of time. I am here to assist you to overcome the issues through yoga practice." by July Lai

settings.title: Tomoko
settings.text:
"Our body has so much potential more than we think.
No one has the same body so we just need different approach and cultivate our own path.
I want you to be the master of your body, mind and soul.
I’m looking forward to seeing you on the mat and exploring your yoga journey together." by Tomoko

settings.text: Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.
